sentences.english: Favorable structure for metallization is the contact-zone as well . as explosive breccia.
sentences.chinese: 接触带和爆破角砾岩带是成矿的有利构造部位。

sentences.english: Conglomerate deposits and special lithologic deposits inside source formation.
sentences.chinese: 生油层系中的砾岩体和特殊岩性体圈闭。

sentences.english: The latter contains well-consolidated structural breccia, cataclastic and mylonitic rocks.
sentences.chinese: 后者则包括固结较好的构造角砾岩，碎裂岩和糜棱岩。

sentences.english: The results show that gypsum breccias can display the creep properties of nonlinearity and acceleration under certain stress level.
sentences.chinese: 研究结果表明，石膏角砾岩流变具有非线性特征。

sentences.english: International football has expanded into a vast sports conglomerate.
sentences.chinese: 国际足球运动已经扩大到了广阔的砾岩。

sentences.english: Qiyugou gold ore deposit is a typical explosive breccia type gold deposit.
sentences.chinese: 祁雨沟金矿是典型的爆破角砾岩型金矿。

sentences.english: It is located in Ap Chau Bay. Ap Chau is are the only two places in Hong Kong where breccia is found (the other one is Crooked Island).
sentences.chinese: 在香港境内，角砾岩只出现于鸭洲和吉澳两个海岛。

sentences.english: Cuttings and core from the drill-holes have intersected conglomerate bands.
sentences.chinese: 钻粉和岩心已穿过了砾岩夹层。

sentences.english: The petrology feature and reservoir property of fanglomerate are analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 对扇砾岩储层岩石学特征及物性特征进行了分析。

sentences.english: The pebble component of Daxi conglomerate trends to complicated upwards.
sentences.chinese: 大溪砾岩的砾石成分有向上趋于复杂的特点。

sentences.english: In Australia no exploitable uraniferous conglomerate has been discovered.
sentences.chinese: 在澳大利亚，尚未发现可开采的含铀砾岩。

sentences.english: The explosive breccia rocks were firstly discovered in the Laoshankou Au Cu deposit.
sentences.chinese: 青河县老山口金铜矿区首次发现隐爆角砾岩。

sentences.english: Putang gold deposit belongs to explosive breccia pipe type.
sentences.chinese: 蒲塘金矿床属爆破角砾岩型。

sentences.english: World football has expanded into a vast sports conglomerate.
sentences.chinese: 世界足球运动已经扩大到了广阔的砾岩。

sentences.english: The ores are mainly of breccia type.
sentences.chinese: 主要矿石类型为角砾岩型。

sentences.english: Shuangwang gold deposit is large with a low tenor breccia in southwest of Taibai, Shaanxi Province.
sentences.chinese: 双王金矿床属大型低品位角砾岩型金矿。
